root.name: Fate/hollow ataraxia
root.description: OverviewThe plot of Fate/hollow ataraxia is takes place half a year after the events of Fate/stay night. Like its prequel, the story is set in Fuyuki City.Bazett Fraga McRemitz, a member of the Mage's Association and a master in the 5th Holy Grail War, wakes on the fourth day of the 5th Holy Grail war with a new servant, Avenger, and no memory of what happened to her beforehand. She and Avenger set off to fight and win the Holy Grail War.
